Subject :- Approval of Amalgamation Of Plots for Plot No: {{PlotNo}} at I.A. {{IAName}}

Dear Sir/Madam,

With reference to your application no.  {{AppNo}}  dated: {{ApplicationDate}} regarding amalgamation of plot no. {{PlotNo}}, Industrial Area {{IAName}}. We hereby inform you that the approval of amalgmation of the above mentioned plots and subsequent creation of new amalgamated plot no. {{AmalgamatedPlots}}, with total area {{AmalgamatedPlotsArea}} Sqr.Mt. is being granted with the following conditions :-

{{ListofAnnexresBP}}

  1. Land use of amalgamated plot shall remain industrial only.
  2. Setback, Ground coverage, and F.A.R. for amalgamated plot shall be as per provision of prevailing UPSIDA Land Development & Building Regulations 2018.
  3. Rectification / Correction deed / Fresh Lease deed for amalgamated plot shall be mandatory to be executed as per the clause no 3.3.7 B(iv) of land development & building regulations 2018 prior to building plan approval on amalgmated plot.
  4. Products allowed for manufacturing on amalgamated plots shall remain same as permissible earlier on non-amalgamated plot, the allottee had to take permission separately before doing so.
  5. Allottee shall be bound to comply with all terms and conditions of allotment and lease deed read with correction/rectification deed or of the fresh lease deed.



Encloser : Copy of approved amalgamation plan.

  • Your's faithfully,
  • For U.P. STATE INDL. DEV. CORPN. LTD.
